signup.title: Build your first Web3 project - FREE
signup.description: Build your first Web3 application with Apillon. Deploy, monitor, and scale with our fully managed blockchain-based back-end service.
signup.emailSent:
We just sent an email containing a link to email{afna}example.com. 
 Click on it to activate your account.
signup.enterDesiredPassword: Enter the desired password to finish the account setup.

login.title: Log in to Apillon
login.description: Web3 will not build itself. Go and add your block.
login.dontHaveAccount: I don’t have Authrail account yet?
login.buildCustomApp: Build a custom app with all the necessary blockchain-based services for your use case.
login.walkThroughWeb3: Walk through a fully Web3-compatible website demo, test a few services and check open-source code.
login.buildWeb3: “Build versatile and high-performing Web3 solutions with Apillon. Harness the power of blockchain technology and create next-gen dapps through simple yet robust APIs”
login.web3ProjectName: Your  Web3 project needs a name
login.loader: Put your Web3 hat on, your dashboard is getting ready.
